entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
